title: Dynamo Neo Blog

The blog of a Com Agency
Manon SAINTOT, Community Animator at Dynamo Neocom
what: An article of decryption of information, which also lists the types of fakenews.

title: Fawkes News
who: Blog Fawkes News, @Guy_Fawkes_News
what: Topics bias that make controversy on the RS. International topics. Facts are denounced without citing any source. No interest in the fight against Fake News.

title: Real or Fake
who: National Geographic Kids
what: Event organized as part of a funfair to educate the youngest to preconceived ideas.

title: Factitious Game
who: Game Lab University Washington, based on an original idea by Maggie Farley Journalist
what: Vrai faux basés sur Tender. Une information est proposée et il faut la juger vrai ou fausse en fonction de la source. Très efficace pour appuyer l'importance de la source.

title: Escape Game Fake News
who: Licence UPMC
what: True/Fake Tender based. An information is proposed and it must be judged true or false according to the source. Very effective in supporting the importance of the source.

title: Bad News
who: DROG develops programs and courses and conducts research to recognize misinformation, particularly online.
what: The game is intended for use in education and scientific research. In this game the user embodies an unscrupulous journalist whose goal is to have as many subscribers as possible.

title: Fakeittomakeitgame
who: Amanda Warner
what: The purpose of the game is to identify the techniques commonly used in the fabrication and dissemination of false information, to understand how false news is written and distributed, and to appeal to specific emotions (fear, anger, etc.) confirmation bias . A smart game.

title: Manuel d'auto-défense intellectuelle
who:
Sophie Mazet
Young teacher in English, ZEP high school in Saint Denis.
what: Composed of nine lessons, this guide proposes to learn how to decipher all the forms of speech whose aim is often to roll us in the flour: from the political discourse to the bio-ecological-fair speech, by way of the advertising language, the speeches by news media, TV series, conspiracy, pseudo-science or extremists of all kinds. A funny, accessible and intelligent book for the younger generation, but also those who wish to put the critical spirit in the spotlight and fight effectively propaganda, language of wood, intoxicating, shortcuts, amalgams, false rumors and psychoses in any kind.

title: FRAGIL
who: Fragil, community project, Media, Culture, Education
what: Fragil has positioned itself since its creation in 2002 at the crossroads of several dimensions: Media, Culture and Education Originally cultural and social media produced in the Nantes metropolis in the Do It Yourself style, Fragil also accompanies today some projects. media education and digital practices with a regional dimension.

title: Fawkes News
who: Blog Fawkes News, @Guy_Fawkes_News
what: Toolbox for decrypting information. We will not fail to see some mistrust in traditional media and institutions. But remains a tool for awakening the critical spirit.

title: Soft Power France Culture
who: Frédéric Martel
what: Discussion with different journalists around the Fact Checking. Gives a good idea of techniques, impacts and risks. Accompanied on the site of the emission of numerous sites of fact checking.

title: Facebook
who: In its Help section, facebook provides 10 tips for identifying fake news
what: We can not say that they do not make an effort. In line with the request for collaboration with recognized journalists, such as Libération or Le Monde. Facebook is trying to redo an image.

title: Blog Les crises
who: Olivier Berruyer
what: The Crises, a blog specialized in economics and geopolitics, offers a complete decoding of information that is controversial. They want to search for the truth between the propaganda of the mass media leading to the "making consent" and the conspiracy delusions of the web.

title: Poynter
who: International Fact Checking Network An information verification label
what: Poynter is a prestigious journalist training organization. He created the IFCN International Fact Checking Network, which is to label fact checkers around the world according to a list of principles.

title: First Draft News
who: First Draft: social networks and press titles pledge against false information
what: Organization bringing together numerous press groups from around the world to fight misinformation. Among the partners are Le Monde, Libération, Le Figaro and AFP.

title: Cross Check
who: Journalist Collaboration, depends on the FirstDraft project created by Nine organizations including Google News Lab https://firstdraftnews.org/about/
what: CrossCheck is a collaborative journalism project that brings together editorial teams from all over France and abroad to accurately deal with misleading, misleading or confusing statements circulating online.

title: France 24 Observers
who: The site of Fact Checking de France 24
what: The journalists of France 24 decrypts the information. The comments of Internet users show the skepticism of these analyzes. Ex: CRS breakers during the demonstration of yellow vests: https://observers.france24.com/en/20181203-france-gilets-jaunes-videos-policiers-casseurs-manifestation-discrediter

title: Next Impact

title: Desinfolab
who: ONG, Associations et organisations sociales et syndicales Brussels, Brussels. Our mission is to fight disinformation with innovative methodology and scientific support to the counter-disinformation community.
what: Non-governmental organization that aims to fight against false information. She became famous in the Benalla affair, publishing a dubious survey of Tweeter users. This NGO works with many volunteers. The processes have been widely questioned especially concerning the recording of tweeter accounts.

title: Play Fake News

title: Bad News

title: Le Blogue Noir De Brocéliande

title: Le Blogue Noir De Brocéliande
who: Normand Baillargeon
what: Indispensable, this little intellectual self-defense course of Normand Baillargeon, proposes us the fundamental tools to the awakening of the critical spirit.
